about_the_game:
Stranded & Naked drops you onto a tropical island paradise with nothing but your wits, survival skills, and one major headache—your old school bully (at least she is HOT).

After a prank gone wrong, your so-called friends leave you and your nemesis stranded in the middle of nowhere as their boat sinks! Lucky for you, you’re a nature-loving survivalist who came prepared with tools, gear, and a trusty fishing pole. The island’s lush beauty and clear waters are a dream come true for someone like you.

But survival isn’t just about food and shelter... it’s about SEX TOO!

A visual novel with survival and collection mechanics, Stranded & Naked lets you spend your days searching for resources and food, and your nights (and days) with Megan. Your unwanted companion—once the bane of your school days—has no clue how to survive, leaving her at your mercy.

It’s finally time to turn the tables. Teach her some lessons, assert your dominance, and maybe, just maybe, enjoy a little payback while taking advantage of this once-in-a-lifetime situation.

Will you make her beg for your help... or for something more?

content_descriptors.notes: Stranded & Naked includes explicit sexual content, nudity, adult language, and themes of domination and power dynamics. Rough sex and blackmail are central themes, there is no non-consensual sex in game though.

After a prank gone wrong, your so-called friends leave you and your nemesis stranded in the middle of nowhere as their boat sinks! Lucky for you, you’re a nature-loving survivalist who came prepared with tools, gear, and a trusty fishing pole. The island’s lush beauty and clear waters are a dream come true for someone like you.

But survival isn’t just about food and shelter... it’s about SEX TOO!

A visual novel with survival and collection mechanics, Stranded & Naked lets you spend your days searching for resources and food, and your nights (and days) with Megan. Your unwanted companion—once the bane of your school days—has no clue how to survive, leaving her at your mercy.

It’s finally time to turn the tables. Teach her some lessons, assert your dominance, and maybe, just maybe, enjoy a little payback while taking advantage of this once-in-a-lifetime situation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 64 bit Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 64 bit Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Super
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9.5
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura 13.5
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Stranded & Naked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Super
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Stranded on a tropical island with your old high school bully... Time to settle the scores with her and the best way to do that is with plenty of steamy hate-fueled sex!
